name: Fireball
effect: (dragons immune) slays multiple minions (roll + lvl of wizard/elf - lvl of minion = number killed).  If used vs boss, auto 1 wound

name: Lightning Bolt
effect: kills just one minion but 2 wounds vs boss (if it hits)

name: Sleep
effect: perform attack roll, if it hits, defeats boss or d6+L minions.  Dragons and undead are immune

name: Protect
effect: Defense roll +1 for a single hero during battle

name: Frost Nova
effect: When hit, on minion roll + lvl - minion lvl = num minion paralized, they will not attack on their next turn, if boss hit it will lose 2 attacks for his next combat round, on explode lose one more attack.

name: Healing Surge
effect: Heal 2 life all heros minus caster, vampires -2 life

name: Mass teleport
effect: Teleport all party out of the dungeon or to any room 1dmg to wizard for every hero

name: Aura of Terror
effect: Minion or boss to make moral roll, undead and fear are imune

name: Reverse Gaze
effect: when tested by gaze test it on the monster instead d8 + wiz lvl

name: Life force control
effect: Trade life with another hero, against vampires lose 1 life

name: Infalible missile
effect: Auto dmg , rol a d8 on a explode inflic another dmg
